page.title: 09A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MY DAD
page.content: First thing in the morning my dad wakes up at 6.00 a.m. and makes a cup of tea. He has no breakfast. At 7.00 a.m. he gets his lunch bag and puts it in his van and drives to work. He has two breaks, one at 10.00 a.m. when he has just a drink of coffee and another at 1.30 p.m. when he eats a packed lunch. He has sandwiches and a packet of crisps. My dad is a bricklayer and helps to build houses and shops. The firm is called Barnwood Builders and at the moment they are building a big Police Station just outside Gloucester. He finishes work at 5.30 p.m. and gets home half an hour later. When he gets home he has his tea, sits on the settee and reads the newspaper. Sometimes he watches television or goes to the public house. He likes to watch films and sport.
